title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Inflation, Middle East on fire, gas shortages. Rush knew Trump ended our dependence on foreign oil, and Biden is reversing it in a matter of months. Granholm claims higher energy prices don't impact you if you drive an electric car. $5 million in ransom paid to pipeline hackers? Kerry testimony. Kerry denies giving Iran inside information on Israel's covert operations in Syria. Rush on how Obama and Kerry sold out Israel to the Iranians. Rumor Biden will resume construction of Trump wall in Rio Grande Valley. Biden is not functionally the president. Rush on Californians fleeing to Idaho.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Red states bailing out blue state lockdown losses as Rush told us would happen. Russia, Russia, Russia! Limbaugh Institute teaching tells us the Drive-Bys will buy Biden's pipeline deflections. Vaccinated people fear going back to normal life more than non-vaccinated people. Fauci says vaccinated can go outside without masks. Rush on how liberals use fear to indoctrinate kids in college. Callers on immigration, covid, Fauci. Rush on the role of president as defender of the country and the Constitution.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Trump's wall was compassion. Biden to restart construction of Trump's wall in Rio Grande Valley? Rush on enforcing the law on the border. Kafka trap. Rush on how liberals want to understand everyone's anger except for the anger of conservatives against the establishment. Military leaders write letter warning of Biden's dementia. Rush on the purpose of armies: Kill people and break things. EIB High Note: Story of turning a negative into a positive, much the way Rush continued doing a radio show while deaf. GPS tracking is the next wave of government control.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
